summary: 3 default bound weapons are now handsfree.
descriptionHtml:
I have had a vision. A vision to help people get the bound weapons a lot faster than the vanilla game. So, that's exactly what i did!!!!

I have added 3 new spells (same as bound weapons but voice) to the game, the sword is Sukriiviing's Sword, the battleaxe is Sukriiviing's Battleaxe, and the bow is as you may have guessed Sukriiviing's Bow.

I named these weapons after my character Sukriiviing, which means in the dragon tongue: Winged-Air-Killer, clever right? I might make a new version when the bow is better and the names will be changed.

I shortened the bow's time because if you sheathe it, it doesnt disappear and neither do the arrows. So... ENJOY!!!!

To get the spells, you need to press ~ then type /help "Sukriiviing"
author: Sandbox0
